name: Zombie Carnage-alpha 0.2
description:
Zombie Carnage.

A survival game where you play as a investigator trying to find a reason why the town's people has been turn into zombies?We are not sure...are they really zombies?
Well we have to find out...
Find food,water and water to survive and find the reason at all costs.Explore this small town and discover dark mysteries of this town and KILL THEM ALL.

Features:
-Needs(like energy,hunger).
-Extremly cool light system.(Credits to Nik,Fatalsleep and xygthop3 for pretty light)
-9different guns.(Extrmeley rare ones as well)
-A town to explore.
Follow this game to recive further updates and news of how the game is going.Be prepared...Not eveyone can survive...
